full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/18/2023 STANDARD FORM NO. 64 Office Memorandum UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT File 14036/392-A TO : Central Office, Washington, D. C. DATE: Sept. 17, 1948 FROM : Judson F. Shaw, Actg. Officer in Charge, San Pedro, Calif. SUBJECT: C. O. File 56260/822 v/Au, of Sept. 10, 1948: WONG GUCK ON With reference to your memorandum of above number and date, you are informed that the records of this office contain information concerning WONG GUCK ON as follows: REC'D IN MAIL UNIT Boyhood Name: WONG GUCK ON DEPT. OF JUSTICE Marriage Name: WONG YIP LAI SEP 22 1948 Date of Birth: CR 7-16-10 (July 17, 1918) OUT I & N SERVICE VAU-6 9-24 Place of Birth: Song Lung Village Sun Ning District China Date of Marriage: CR 22-9-5 (October 23, 1933) Arrivals in United States: October 21, 1932, San Pedro, Calif., SS RECEIVED DEPARTMENT "PRESIDENT COOLIDGE"; admitted to United States by Board of Special Inquiry as United States citizen on November 7, 1932 VERFICATION 27 July 5, 1936, San Pedro, Calif., SS OF ARRIVAL "PRESIDENT HOOVER"; admitted to United States as United States citizen upon surrender of Form 430 which had been approved at Los Angeles, Calif., on July 29, 1933. Certificate of Identity: No. 67098, issued at San Pedro, Calif., on November 16, 1932, showing admission to the United States ex SS "PRESIDENT COOLIDGE" October 21, 1932, as U. S. Citizen (parol evidence). 10/10 Departures: August 20, 1933, San Pedro, Calif., SS "PRESIDENT LINCOLN". FAMILY HISTORY: Father (Boyhood Name) : WONG SICK HONG San Francisco, Calif., file 25421/3-17. Marriage Name: WONG CHOON WAI ) Date of Birth: KS 4-5-20 (June 20, 1878) VAU BB
